fullText: This new production of '1776' is a bold reimagining that breathes fresh life into the familiar material, with stellar performances and thoughtful direction that makes the founding fathers feel urgently relevant.
dtliExcerpt: This new production of '1776' is a bold reimagining that breathes fresh life into the familiar material, with stellar performances and thoughtful direction that makes the founding fathers feel urgently relevant.
bwwExcerpt: The remarkable revival of "1776," cast entirely with female, transgender and nonbinary actors, is not as much about the pronouns as it is about a verb. Because the delightful ensemble owns the script and score of this 1969 musical as if the story of the signing of the Declaration of Independence wer...
